name: Entre-Deux (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté)
description:
"My name is Elrica Elsa. Five years ago, our world, Medocorilia, has fallen prey to the undead. It's hard for me to survive, especially since I'm pregnant, but now I am in the Community, a village of Entre-Deux, and I have 10 hours to 'prove my worth'... or die!"

Entre-Deux is an short interactive story written with Twine with some RNG battles! 

-------------------------------

  • You can toogle fullscreen with the ENTER key.
  • Choice of fonts, text size and background colors in the Settings menu! You can change the language there too.

Also, if you post about it on social media, please use the #EntreDeux hashtag. Thanks.
